items.fromString: [~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3]  we need assistance to verify that as [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08]  doesn’t have a tablet.

items.toString: Video Training Updates - Hood River Cherry Company (220)

items.fromString:
This is a placeholder for Hood River who will be sending us Video Updates by EOD. 

Training Videos getting updated:

Changing the Packing House Orientation - Super Short Video - ENG SPA

Adding a Heat Rule video - ENG/ Spanish came through as 2 videos - Pt 1 & 2. 

Adding an Employee Handbook training - ENG & SPA 



Prioritize Spanish. 



DEADLINE JUNE 9th!



__________________________________________________

Another Training Video will be added as well. Two shorter videos

Video we already have, hygiene and another one. Not in a rush to enter these in. 

Separate Clump of videos



Once we get all of the other info in. 



Sometime prior to the end of June.

comments.body: [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08]  this will be time sensitive and we are on fairly unfamiliar grounds here also so we should give this high priority when we have the data to work with the ticket.

Thank you, [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] — That is exactly why I wanted to build the ticket ahead of time so that we have the most notice as soon as we receive the data. I received a message from Millie yesterday which stated she should have the data in sometime today in the AM. I will add it as soon as I see it come through!

Hi [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] & [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08]! We have received links! Please let me know if you are able to access these—if not, we will have to reach back out to update the Google Drive sharing Millie is doing—

[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] some of these videos are in different formats. Our documentation says they should all be converted to mp4 - [https://ganaz.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SOFTWARE/pages/11403298/Training+Track+Creation+Update#Video-Compression|https://ganaz.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SOFTWARE/pages/11403298/Training+Track+Creation+Update#Video-Compression|smart-link] I guess I also need to push them up to s3 so I will do this.
[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] is this actually two tickets? It looks like part of it is due by the 9th but the rest is not due until later?

Hi [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08],
Thank you for your replies! Do we need to reach back out to the customer to see if we can get the .mov videos in mp4?

Also–you are totally right about the two tickets. I’m sorry! I should remove that language. The videos for Part 2 haven’t been sent yet, but I can create that ticket when we do receive more info from Millie. Those won’t be tied to this ticket or the June 9th deadline.
We don’t need them to take any action in regards to the video formats, I’ve converted them.

Hi All,

With the newest updates installed yesterday, are we able to confirm that the 2023 Packing House - Spanish videos match the order that was requested and are playing the correct videos?

[1 Hand Book Spanish copy.mp4|https://drive.google.com/file/d/12UQShU0TSfEoD2gt4Ty9YXtnOc6vbmxf/view?usp=drive_web]

[2 PH Orientation Spanish.mp4|https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lqbcghxxV5FyZI7xtXfddHeLsuaDu_gb/view?usp=drive_web]

[3 PH Hygiene Spanish copy.mov|https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kpNN2zV06XC8HPo1CrlyTXi-WzBGrTJe/view?usp=drive_web]

[4 PH Health and Safety Spanish copy.mp4|https://drive.google.com/file/d/1A1zpzDi5jtKDuzTPhtUS7UTmQtm11QrS/view?usp=drive_web]

[5 Heat Rule Spanish 1.mp4|https://drive.google.com/file/d/10adaiE4hbB4fYUA4RqgRwPKywv7gtYt0/view?usp=drive_web]

[6 Heat Rule Spanish 2.mp4|https://drive.google.com/file/d/10snMgRemLW0OGBBN909wUQZRjARNUQXv/view?usp=drive_web]

[7 Wash your hands - Spanish copy.mp4|https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qgLVX0iFssQBj_6s9R9Pwbb8rRUSJwXM/view?usp=drive_web]
 

This is the track she will be using tomorrow, so she has asked to ensure this one is correct. Millie cannot test today as she is in an all-day training and I can see that Edgar is also booked almost completely out. If we are able to have someone in ENG test this I would greatly appreciate it 🙏

[~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08] [~accountid:5b5631f96366b42ca0ded60d]

[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] I’m not able to test as I don’t have a tablet. I also had to combine the heat rule videos to make the number of segments match in english and Spanish. Otherwise as far as I know it should be good, but we need someone with a tablet to test.

[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] to be very clear, their tablet _must_ show 8 training tracks _and_ have version 4.1.1.40 or they will experience issues including incorrect tracks/videos. We _cannot_ test that for them—they have to do it themselves on their own physical devices (_all_ devices they will be using! we can’t “remote wipe” / “remote reset” for them). It will be very difficult to provide day-of support for this, so they really should get this done _today_.

[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] I verified the spanish videos for 2023 Packing House Spanish and they check out (/) 

here’s what my tablet configuration looks like:

* Note at the top the “8”
* Note the version is “4.1.1.40” (small chance the final “40” varies from tablet-to-tablet—that’s fine, but the first three need to be ”4.1.1”)

!IMG_3889.jpg|width=4032,height=3024!

Hi Kyle,

Thank you so much for confirming! I passed this along to Millie and she was able to bring the tablets home with her last night and she was able to configure these devices so they are all showing up with the correct 8 Videos! I think this means we were successful! 

She would like to test all of the videos in the track, but she is having a hard time switching in between them. Is there still a way where she can skip a video in a track by swiping through it? She let me know she was able to do this in the past but it doesn’t appear to be working for her now.

Also, she let me know they currently don’t use the “default video that plays at the beginning” - Since I am not able to test, I asked her to explain and I think it is like some tutorial video that explains how the training app works? I’m not 100% sure if this is even something she could skip/remove but I told her I would ask!

[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] I suspect they are referring to this intro video: [https://training.ganaz.com/training-intro-1.mp4|https://training.ganaz.com/training-intro-1.mp4]

we can replace it a 1s video if they need us to (this would be something we do next week mid-week as it needs testing!)



Skipping: swipe left to right in to top 1/3 of the video (so above the play/pause). It’s a bit tricky and some android versions override the gesture and won’t allow it to work.
[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3]  is this good. can we close this ticket?

Hi [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513], thank you for checking in on this!
She was interested in replacing the video at the beginning of the 1s video that Kyle mentioned in the comment below—should we create a new ticket for that request?
[~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] yes, create a new ticket please so we can track the work requests
